example.name: complete_opencode_integration
example.scenario: Complete integration of OpenCode CLI with oh-my-opencode, antigravity-auth, and SkillHub skills to create an autonomous agent system with self-healing, self-learning, and self-evolving capabilities.
example.user_request: Integrate OpenCode CLI with supplemental repositories and skills to create an autonomous agent with self-healing, self-learning, and self-evolving behaviors.

step.approach: Check OpenCode CLI version, verify .opencode directory structure, and review existing configurations. Outcome: Confirm OpenCode CLI v1.1.40 is installed with basic configuration.
step.expected_outcome: Current installation status verified and baseline configuration documented

step.approach: Verify oh-my-opencode and opencode-antigravity-auth are already configured in opencode.json. Outcome: Both plugins are properly configured and ready for use.
step.analysis: Plugins are already installed, proceed to authentication setup

step.description: Set up authentication for premium models
step.approach: Run opencode auth login to configure Google OAuth for antigravity models. Outcome: Authentication configured for accessing premium models.
step.expected_outcome: Google OAuth authentication set up successfully

step.approach:
Install all required skills using SkillHub API: - proffesor-for-testing-agentic-qe-skill-builder - maxritter-claude-codepro-backend-models-standards - obra-superpowers-systematic-debugging - modu-ai-moai-adk-moai-tool-opencode - muratcankoylan-agent-skills-for-context-engineering-memory-systems - madappgang-claude-code-debugging-strategies - vasilyu1983-ai-agents-public-git-commit-message
Outcome: All skills installed and available in .opencode/skill directory.
step.expected_outcome: All required skills installed and ready for configuration

step.approach:
Update oh-my-opencode.json to enable: - Sisyphus agent with autonomous capabilities - Self-healing mechanisms (error detection, recovery, fallbacks) - Self-learning features (pattern recognition, knowledge retention) - Self-evolution capabilities (behavior adaptation, optimization)
Outcome: Autonomous behaviors configured and ready for testing.

Map skills to appropriate agents: - Debugging skills → oracle agent - Frontend skills → frontend-ui-ux-engineer - Testing skills → sisyphus agent - Git skills → all agents
Outcome: Skills properly integrated and accessible in workflows.

Verify: - All plugins load correctly - Premium models are accessible - Skills function properly - Autonomous behaviors work as expected - System performance is acceptable
Outcome: Integration tested and validated.

example.completion: Successfully integrated OpenCode CLI with oh-my-opencode and opencode-antigravity-auth plugins, installed all required SkillHub skills, and configured autonomous agent behaviors including self-healing, self-learning, and self-evolution capabilities. The system is now ready for autonomous development tasks.

key_takeaways.takeaway: Always verify existing installations before adding new components
Enable autonomous features incrementally to ensure stability
Map skills to agent expertise for optimal performance
Test each component thoroughly before proceeding to the next

example.name: autonomous_agent_configuration
example.scenario: Configure an autonomous agent with self-healing, self-learning, and self-evolving capabilities using the Sisyphus agent framework.
example.user_request: Set up an autonomous agent that can heal itself, learn from experience, and evolve its behavior over time.

step.description: Configure Sisyphus agent for autonomous operation
step.approach:
Update agent configuration in oh-my-opencode.json: - Set autonomous: true - Enable self_healing, self_learning, self_evolving - Configure model with thinking variant for enhanced reasoning
Outcome: Sisyphus agent configured for autonomous operation.
step.expected_outcome: Sisyphus agent ready for autonomous tasks

step.approach:
Configure self-healing hooks: - Error detection with threshold of 3 failures - Auto-recovery with 30-second timeout - Fallback strategies for critical failures - Maximum of 3 retry attempts
Outcome: Self-healing mechanisms active and monitoring.
step.expected_outcome: Agent can automatically recover from errors

step.approach:
Configure learning features: - Pattern recognition for identifying successful strategies - Knowledge retention in persistent memory - Performance tracking for continuous improvement - Learning rate of 0.1 for gradual adaptation
Outcome: Self-learning system ready to accumulate knowledge.
step.expected_outcome: Agent can learn from interactions and improve over time

step.approach:
Set up evolution mechanisms: - Behavior adaptation based on performance metrics - Strategy optimization for task completion - Continuous improvement with evolution rate of 0.05 - Adaptation threshold of 0.8 for significant changes
Outcome: Self-evolution capabilities configured and active.
step.expected_outcome: Agent can evolve its behavior based on experience

step.approach:
Run comprehensive tests: - Trigger errors to verify self-healing - Perform tasks to observe learning - Monitor behavior changes for evolution - Validate all autonomous features work together
Outcome: Autonomous behaviors tested and validated.

example.completion: Successfully configured an autonomous agent with comprehensive self-healing, self-learning, and self-evolving capabilities. The agent can now recover from errors, learn from experience, and adapt its behavior for continuous improvement.

key_takeaways.takeaway: Configure autonomous features incrementally to ensure stability
Set appropriate thresholds and limits for autonomous behaviors
Test each autonomous feature thoroughly before deployment
Monitor autonomous behavior to ensure it aligns with expectations
